data.title: united1904baptisms
data.text:
From the original records on microfilm #1550432 at the Northern Kentucky Family History Center at 144 Buttermilk Pike in Lakeside Park. This Church was originally St Johns German Evangelical Church.

These records were in German. The old Germanic writing is difficult to read. Any transcriptions errors are mine. I have transcribed what I can decipher. Please view the originals or verify with other sources. There are a few records that have faded or smudged so much that they are illegible. I have spelled the last names as written. Born in Newport, Ky unless otherwise noted.
